title: Test
summary: This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Revenue in million euros, with a total of 14 data points.
Overall Revenue in million euros has increased over the Year.

Revenue in million euros is roughly constant from 2004/05 to 2005/06, gradually increasing from 2005/06 to 2007/08, slightly decreasing from 2007/08 to 2008/09, slightly increasing from 2008/09 to 2009/10, roughly constant from 2009/10 to 2010/11, slightly increasing from 2010/11 to 2011/12, roughly constant from 2011/12 to 2014/15, slightly increasing from 2014/15 to 2015/16, and lastly roughly constant from 2015/16 to 2017/18.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year 2014/15 and 2015/16.
Max Revenue in million euros about 4579.8 was recorded at Year 2015/16
Min Revenue in million euros about 659.2 was recorded at Year 2004/05
This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Revenue in million euros, with a total of 14 data points. The chart has 5 significant trends.
The longest trend is moderately increasing which exists from 2004/05 to 2008/09.
Also, the next significant trend is extremely increasing which exists from 2012/13 to 2015/16.
Also, the next significant trend is slightly decreasing which exists from 2015/16 to 2017/18.
But, the next significant trend is moderately increasing which exists from 2010/11 to 2012/13.
Similarly, the next significant trend is moderately increasing which exists from 2008/09 to 2010/11.
